entry.title: Minimum Requirements of ASHRAE 62.1-2010
entry.content:
1. Outdoor Air Quality
    1. Regional Air Quality
    2. Local Air Quality
    3. Documentation
  2. System and Equipment
    1. Natural Ventilation
      1. Location and Size of Openings
      2. Control and Accessibility
    2. Ventilation Air Distribution
      1. Designing for Air Balancing
      2. Plenum Systems
      3. Documentation
    3. Exhaust Duct Location
    4. Ventilation System Controls
    5. Airstream Surfaces
      1. Resistance to Mold Growth
      2. Resistance to Erosion
    6. Outdoor Air Intakes
      1. Location
      2. Rain Entrainment
      3. Rain Intrusion
      4. Snow Intrusion
      5. Bird Screens
    7. Local Capture of Containments
    8. Combustion Air
    9. Particle Matter Removal
    10. Dehumidification Systems
      1. Relative Humidity
      2. Exfiltration
    11. Drain Pans
      1. Drain Pan Slope
      2. Drain Outlet
      3. Drain Seal
      4. Pan Size
    12. Finned-Tube Coils and Heat Exchangers
      1. Drain Pans
      2. Finned-Tube Coil Selection for Cleaning
    13. Humidifiers and Water-Spray Systems
      1. Water Quality
      2. Obstructions
    14. Access for Inspection, Cleaning, and Maintenance
      1. Equipment Clearance
      2. Ventilation Equipment Access
      3. Air Distribution System
    15. Building Envelope and Interior Surfaces
      1. Building Envelope
      2. Condensation on Interior Surfaces
    16. Buildings with Attached Parking Garages
    17. Air Classification and Recirculation
      1. Classification
      2. Re-designation
        1. Air Cleaning
        2. Energy Recovery
        3. Transfer
      3. Recirculation Limitations
        1. Class 1 Air
        2. Class 2 Air
        3. Class 3 Air
        4. Class 4 Air
      4. Documentation
    18. Requirements for Buildings Containing ETS Areas and ETS-Free Areas
      1. Classification
      2. Pressurization
      3. Separation
      4. Trasfer Air
      5. Recirculation
      6. Exhaust Systems
      7. Signage
      8. Classification
  3. Procedures
    1. General
      1. Ventilation Rate Procedure
    2. Ventilation Rate Procedure
      1. Outdoor Air Treatment
        1. Particle Matter
        2. Ozone
        3. Other Outdoor Contaminants
      2. Zone Calculations
        1. Breathing Zone Outdoor Airflow
        2. Zone Air Distribution Effectiveness
        3. Zone Outdoor Airflow
        4. 100% Outdoor Air Systems
        5. Multiple-Zone Recirculating Systems
          1. Primary Outdoor Air Fraction
          2. System Ventilation Efficiency
          3. Uncorrected Outdoor Air Intake
          4. Outdoor Air Intake
        6. Design for Varying Operating Conditions
          1. Variable Load Conditions
          2. Short-Term Conditions

entry.title: Mandatory Provision in ASHRAE 90.1_2010
entry.content:
1. Building Envelope

    1. Insulation
      1. Labeling of Building Envelope Insulaiton
      2. Compliance with Manufacturers' Requirements
      3. Loose-Fill Insulation Limitation
      4. Baffles
      5. Substantial Contact
      6. Recessed Equipment
      7. Insulation Protection
      8. Location of Roof Insulaiton
      9. Extent of Insulaiton
    2. Fenestration and Doors
      1. Rating of Fenestration Products
      2. Labeling of Fenestration Products
      3. Labeling of Doors
      4. U-factor
      5. Solar Heat Gain Coefficient
      6. Visible Transmittance
    3. Air Leakage
      1. Continuous Air Barrier
        1. Air Barrier Design
        2. Air Barrier Installation
        3. Accenptable Materials and Assemblies
      2. Fenestration and Doors
      3. Loading Dock Weatherseals
      4. Vestibules

  2. Heating,Ventilating,and Air Conditioning

    1. Equipment Efficeincies,Verification,and Labeling Requirements
      1. Minimum Equipment Efficiencies-Listed Equipment-Standard Rating and Operating Conditions
        1. Air Conditioners and Condensing Units
        2. Heat Pumps
        3. Water-Chilling Packages
        4. Packaged Terminal and Room Air Conditioners and Heat Pumps
        5. Furnaces, Duct Furnaces, and Unit Heaters
        6. Boilers
        7. Heat Rejection Equipment
        8. Heat Transfer Equipment
        9. Variable Refrigerant Flow Air Conditioners
        10. Variable Refrigerant Flow Air-to-Air and Applied Heat Pumps
        11. Air Conditioners Serving Computer Rooms
      2. Minimum Equipment Efficiencies-Listed Equipment-Nonstandard Conditions
        1. Water-cooled centrifugal chilling packages
        2. Positive displacement(air- and water-cooled) chilling packages
      3. Equipment Not Listed
      4. Verification of Equipment Efficiencies <=here
      5. Labeling
        1. Mechanical Equipment
        2. Packaged Terminal Air Conditioners
    2. Caculations
      1. Load Calculations=>ASHRAE183 Peak Cooling and Heating Load Calculation in Buildings Except Low-Rise Residential Buildings
      2. Pump Head
    3. Controls
      1. Zone Thermostatic Controls
        1. General
        2. Dead Band
      2. Setpoint Overlap Restriction
      3. Off-Hour Controls
        1. Automatic Shutdown
        2. Setback Controls
        3. Optimum Start Controls
        4. Zone Isolation
      4. Ventilation System Controls
        1. Stair and Shaft Vents
        2. Shutoff Damper Controls
        3. Damper Leakage
        4. Ventilation Fan Controls
        5. Enclosed Parking Garage Ventilation
      5. Heat Pump Auxilary Heat Control
      6. Humidifier Preheat
      7. Humidification and Dehumidification
      8. Freeze Protection and Snow/Ice Melting System
      9. Ventilation Controls for High-Occupancy Areas
      10. Single Zone Variable-Air-Volume Controls
    4. HVAC System Construction and Insulation
      1. Insulation
        1. General
        2. Duct and Plenum Insulation
        3. Piping Insulation
        4. Sensible Heating Panel Insulation
        5. Radiant Floor Heating
      2. Ductwork and Plenum Leakage
        1. Duct Sealing
        2. Duct Leakage Tests
  3. Service Water Heating
    1. Load Calculations
    2. Equipment Efficiency
    3. Service Hot-Water Piping Insulation
    4. Service Water Heating System Controls
      1. Temperature Controls
      2. Temperature Maintenance Controls
      3. Outlet Temperature Controls
      4. Circulating Pump Controls
    5. Pools
      1. Pool Heaters
      2. Pool Covers
      3. Time Switches
    6. Heat Traps
  4. Power
    1. Voltage Drop
      1. Feeders
      2. Branch Circuits
    2. Automatic Receptacle Control
  5. Lighting
    1. Lighting Control
      1. Automatic Lighting Shutoff
      2. Space Control
      3. Parking Garage Lighting Control
      4. Automatic Daylighting Controls for Primary Sidelighted Areas
      5. Automatic Daylighting Controls for Toplighting
      6. Additional Control
      7. Exterior Lighting Control
    2. Exit Signs
    3. Exterior Building Lighting Power
    4. Functional Testing
  6. Other Equipment
    1. Electric Motors
    2. Service Water Presure Booster Systems
    3. Elevators
      1. Lighting
      2. Ventilation Power Limitation
      3. Standby Mode
